entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:40 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
